title: 小桌子

replies.author: mo_yiljx
replies.txt_content:
标题: 小桌子 本帖最后由 mo_yiljx 于 2016-7-6 16:00 编辑

air}}},Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,Time:1,TileEntityData:{Command:summon FallingSand ~2 ~ ~1 {Tile:152,Time:1}},Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,Time:1,TileEntityData:{Command:summon FallingSand ~3 ~ ~2 {Tile:137,Time:1,TileEntityData:{Command:summon FallingSand ~-1 ~1 ~-1 @e[type=Wolf,name=table]}}},Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,Time:1,TileEntityData:{Command:summon FallingSand ~4 ~ ~ {Tile:137,Time:1,TileEntityData:{Command:execute carpet}}},Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,Time:1,TileEntityData:{Command:summon FallingSand ~2 ~ ~ {Tile:137,Time:1,TileEntityData:{Command:execute @e[type=Wolf,name=table] ~ ~ ~ /setblock {display:{Name:"table"}}},Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,Time:1,TileEntityData:{Command:gamerule commandBlockOutput false}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}复制代码
